head.title: Extract barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdShortName}} to detect and extract barcode data from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} without additional software.

header.title: Extract barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Easily detect and extract barcode information from PDF, Word, Excel, and image files using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document parsing API for {{EnvName}} developers. It enables the extraction of text, images, structured content, and barcodes from various file formats including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more â€” all without relying on external tools.

formats.title: Supported formats for barcode extraction
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports barcode detection in a wide range of document and image formats. See below for commonly supported file types.

examples.comment_2: Extract all text content from the file
examples.comment_3: If the text is unavailable, the result will be null
examples.comment_4: Use the extracted text in your application
examples.comment_5: Text extraction is unsupported for this format

steps.title: Steps to extract text from {{FileformatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: You can extract clean and structured text from {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps with [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) by following these steps:
content.step_1: Open the {{FileFormatUp}} document using a {{textParser}} instance.
content.step_2: Extract the text from the file content.
content.step_3: Check the result to confirm text extraction was successful.
content.step_4: Use the extracted text in your business logic, indexing, or data pipelines.

more_features.title: Advanced document parsing features
more_features.description: Beyond barcode extraction, {{ProdShortName}} allows you to extract plain text, images, and structured data to support advanced automation and data processing workflows.

feature_1.title: Support for multiple barcode formats
feature_1.content: Recognize common barcode types including QR Code, Code 128, Data Matrix, EAN, Aztec, and more.

feature_2.title: Extract barcodes from documents and images
feature_2.content: Read barcodes from PDF, Word, Excel documents, and image formats like JPEG, PNG, and BMP.

feature_3.title: Customizable extraction settings
feature_3.content: Configure detection options such as scanning regions and processing multi-page documents.

code_1.title: How to parse PDF using templates
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to extract data from a PDF file using specific templates.
